metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3818 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description: WordPress 2.9.2 and 3.0.4 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals theinstallation path in an error message, as demonstrated bywp-admin/includes/user.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
